title: Two storied house in high residential area, close to Vidura College
details:
Architecturally designed almost brand new two storied house for sale at Samagi Mawatha, Hokandara Road, Thalawathugoda,
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Four bed rooms
TV lobby
Two barhrooms
Modern fitted pantry
Two parking
Landscaped front and rear garden
Facing 20 ft wide road
High residential area
Calm and quite neighbourhood
24 hour security in gated community
